Wisdom: الطَّاعَةُ إِجَابَةٌ
enWisdom: Obedience is compliance

Wisdom: الطَّاعَةُ غَنِيمَةُ الْأَكْيَاسِ
enWisdom: Obedience is the prize) of the sagacious

Wisdom: الطَّاعَةُ هِمَّةُ الْأَكْيَاسِ
enWisdom: Obedience is the endeavor of the sagacious

Wisdom: أَطِعِ اللَّهَ فِي جُمَلِ أُمُورِكَ فَإِنَّ طَاعَةَ اللَّهِ [سُبْحَانَهُ‏] فَاضِلَةٌ عَلَى كُلِّ شَيْ‏ءٍ وَالْزَمِ الْوَرَعَ
enWisdom: Obey Allah in all you affairs, for indeed obedience to Allah is superior to everything; and espouse piety

Wisdom: أَشْرَفُ الْأَعْمَالِ الطَّاعَةُ
enWisdom: The most honourable action is obedience [to Allah]

Wisdom: أَحَبُّ الْعِبَادِ إِلَى اللَّهِ أَطْوَعُهُمْ لَهُ
enWisdom: The most beloved of servants to Allah is the most obedient of them to Him

Wisdom: أَجْدَرُ النَّاسِ بِرَحْمَةِ اللَّهِ أَقْوَمُهُمْ بِالطَّاعَةِ
enWisdom: The most deserving of Allah’s mercy among the people are those who are most steadfast in His obedience

Wisdom: أَوَّلُ مَا يَجِبُ عَلَيْكُمْ لِلَّهِ سُبْحَانَهُ شُكْرُ أَيَادِيهِ وَابْتِغَاءُ مَرَاضِيهِ
enWisdom: The first thing that is incumbent upon you with regards to Allah, the Glorified, is being grateful for His blessings and seeking His pleasure

Wisdom: إِنَّ اللَّهَ سُبْحَانَهُ إِذَا أَرَادَ بِعَبْدٍ خَيْراً وَفَّقَهُ لِإِنْفَاذِ أَجَلِهِ فِي أَحْسَنِ عَمَلِهِ وَرَزَقَهُ مُبَادَرَةَ مَهَلِهِ فِي طَاعَتِهِ قَبْلَ الْفَوْتِ
enWisdom: Verily when Allah, the Glorified, wishes good for a servant, He grants him success in spending his lifetime doing the best deeds and blesses him with the ability to quickly use his available time to perform acts of worship, before [the coming of] his death

Wisdom: بِالطَّاعَةِ يَكُونُ الْإِقْبَالُ
enWisdom: Through obedience one draws nearer [to Allah]

Wisdom: تَمَسَّكْ بِطَاعَةِ اللَّهِ يُزْلِفْكَ
enWisdom: Hold on to the obedience of Allah and He will bring your nearer [to Himself]

Wisdom: تَنَفَّسُوا قَبْلَ ضِيقِ الْخِنَاقِ وَانْقَادُوا قَبْلَ عُنْفِ السِّيَاقِ
enWisdom: Breathe before the necks are strangled, and yield before being driven violently

Wisdom: جِوَارُ اللَّهِ مَبْذُولٌ لِمَنْ أَطَاعَهُ وَتَجَنَّبَ مُخَالَفَتَهُ
enWisdom: Proximity to Allah is granted to those who obey Him and keep away from disobedience to Him

Wisdom: جَمَالُ الْعَبْدِ الطَّاعَةُ
enWisdom: The beauty of a servant is [in his] obedience

Wisdom: زَكَاةُ الصِّحَّةِ السَّعْيُ فِي طَاعَةِ اللَّهِ
enWisdom: The alms-tax of good health is striving in the obedience of Allah

Wisdom: سُنَّةُ الْأَبْرَارِ حُسْنُ الِاسْتِسْلَامِ
enWisdom: The practice of the righteous people is complete submission [to the will of Allah]

Wisdom: سُرُورُ الْمُؤْمِنِ بِطَاعَةِ رَبِّهِ وَحُزْنُهُ عَلَى ذَنْبِهِ
enWisdom: The joy of a believer is in the obedience of his Lord, and his sorrow is due to his sin

Wisdom: سَارِعُوا إِلَى الطَّاعَاتِ وَسَابِقُوا إِلَى فِعْلِ الصَّالِحَاتِ فَإِنْ قَصَّرْتُمْ فَإِيَّاكُمْ وَأَنْ تُقَصِّرُوا عَنْ أَدَاءِ الْفَرَائِضِ
enWisdom: Rush towards acts of obedience and race towards doing righteous actions, but if you fall short, then be careful not to fall short in performing that which is obligatory

Wisdom: طُوبَى لِمَنْ حَافَظَ عَلَى طَاعَةِ رَبِّهِ
enWisdom: Blessed is the one who observes obedience to his Lord

Wisdom: طُوبَى لِمَنْ أَلْزَمَ نَفْسَهُ مَخَافَةَ رَبِّهِ وَأَطَاعَهُ فِي السِّرِّ وَالْجَهْرِ
enWisdom: Blessed be the one who enjoins upon himself the fear of his Lord and obeys Him in secret and in the open

Wisdom: طُوبَى لِمَنْ وُفِّقَ لِطَاعَتِهِ وَبَكَى عَلَى خَطِيئَتِهِ
enWisdom: Blessed is the one who is granted success in his worship and weeps because of his sins

Wisdom: طُوبَى لِمَنْ وُفِّقَ لِطَاعَتِهِ وَحَسُنَتْ خَلِيقَتُهُ وَأَحْرَزَ أَمْرَ آخِرَتِهِ
enWisdom: Blessed is the one who is successful in his obedience [to Allah], has a good character and safeguards the affair of his Hereafter

Wisdom: عَلَيْكَ بِطَاعَةِ اللَّهِ سُبْحَانَهُ فَإِنَّ طَاعَةَ اللَّهِ فَاضِلَةٌ عَلَى كُلِّ شَيْ‏ءٍ
enWisdom: You must show obedience to Allah, the Glorified, for indeed obedience to Allah is superior to everything

Wisdom: غَايَةُ الْعِبَادِ الطَّاعَةُ
enWisdom: The goal [and purpose] of worship is obedience

Wisdom: فِي كُلِّ شَيْ‏ءٍ يُذَمُّ السَّرَفُ إِلَّا فِي صَنَائِعِ الْمَعْرُوفِ وَالْمُبَالَغَةِ فِي الطَّاعَةِ
enWisdom: Extravagance is censured in everything except in performance of virtuous acts and excessiveness in obedience [and worship of Allah]

Wisdom: فَضَائِلُ الطَّاعَاتِ تُنِيلُ رَفِيعَ الْمَقَامَاتِ
enWisdom: The excellence of obedience makes one attain lofty stations

Wisdom: لَيْسَ عَلَى وَجْهِ الْأَرْضِ أَكْرَمُ عَلَى اللَّهِ سُبْحَانَهُ مِنَ النَّفْسِ الْمُطِيعَةِ لِأَمْرِهِ
enWisdom: There is none on the face of this earth more honoured in the sight of Allah, the Glorified, than the soul that is obedient to His commands

Wisdom: مِنْ أَفْضَلِ الْأَعْمَالِ اكْتِسَابُ الطَّاعَاتِ
enWisdom: From the best of deeds is acquiring [and performing] acts of obedience [and worship]

Wisdom: مِنْ فَضِيلَةِ النَّفْسِ الْمُسَارَعَةُ إِلَى الطَّاعَةِ
enWisdom: Hastening towards obedience [of Allah] is a merit of the soul

Wisdom: مَا تَزَيَّنَ مُتَزَيِّنٌ بِمِثْلِ طَاعَةِ اللَّهِ
enWisdom: No adorner can adorn himself with anything better than obedience to Allah

Wisdom: مِلَاكُ كُلِّ خَيْرٍ طَاعَةُ اللَّهِ سُبْحَانَهُ
enWisdom: The basis of every good deed is obedience to Allah, the Glorified

Wisdom: نَحْمَدُ اللَّهَ سُبْحَانَهُ عَلَى مَا وَفَّقَ لَهُ مِنَ الطَّاعَةِ وَذَادَ عَنْهُ مِنَ الْمَعْصِيَةِ
enWisdom: We praise Allah, the Glorified, for the ability He has granted us to carrying out [acts of] obedience and to keep away from disobedience

Wisdom: لَا تَعْتَذِرْ مِنْ أَمْرٍ أَطَعْتَ اللَّهَ سُبْحَانَهُ فِيهِ فَكَفَى بِذَلِكَ مَنْقَبَةً
enWisdom: Do not apologize for an affair in which you have obeyed Allah, the Glorified, for this suffices as a [commendable] virtue

Wisdom: مَنْ طَلَبَ رِضَى اللَّهِ بِسَخَطِ النَّاسِ رَدَّ اللَّهُ ذَامَّهُ مِنَ النَّاسِ حَامِداً
enWisdom: Whoever seeks the pleasure of Allah at the expense of displeasing the people, Allah will turn his dispraiser among the people into his praiser

Wisdom: مَنْ طَلَبَ رِضَى النَّاسِ بِسَخَطِ اللَّهِ رَدَّ اللَّهُ حَامِدَهُ مِنَ النَّاسِ ذَامّاً
enWisdom: Whoever seeks the pleasure of people by displeasing Allah, Allah will turn the one who praises him among the people into one who dispraises him
